dataset.title: Fine root production and nitrogen uptake in 3 alpine plant communities.

abstract.para: Root production was estimated in dry, moist, and wet meadow communities on Niwot Ridge using a root-ingrowth core method. Columns of root-free soil were established on 1 June 1994 and were re-cored on 10 August and 23 September 1994 for measurement of fine root mass and nitrogen content.

description.para: The original iteration of this file was created from a 12 April 1995 email message from Melany Fisk to Rick Ingersoll. The message was archived in /data1/Datman/Mfisk/Roots/Archive. The current file was put under sccs control on 17 April 1995.[RCI 17 April 1995] Suggested revisions provided by Melany Fisk on 25 April 1995 were incorporated into the file on 8 May 1995.[RCI 8 May 1995] Investigator contact information was updated on 23 May 1996.[MAH 23 May 1996] Investigator contact information was updated, and the Fisk 1995, Fisk and Schmidt 1995, and Fisk et al. 1998 citations were added on 2 December 1998.[MAH 2 December 1998]
